title: Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Synthesizing and Critically Evaluating Scientific Arguments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Social studies-linked program designed for pre-service/in-service teachers. Strengthens critical thinking by analyzing real scientific controversy cases in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core arguments in scientific argumentative texts using comparative-contrast techniques
Learners can systematically organize diverse scientific perspectives using the "read-pause-think-note" strategy
Learners can critically integrate and synthesize conflicting scientific information by applying transformation strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
